item.description:
Our monthly gathering, this time at Linda and Ralphâ€™s in Middletown. The word is that Linda will be out of town, so we may be ordering pizza or Chinese for dinner, so plan to bring some cash toward dinner, a drink, snack, or dessert to share, and your ideas for fall and early winter events.

Since the event is in a private home, you must RSVP for details and directions.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
